trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest" /> class adds an entry to the directory.

The request may be added to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> or it can be used as the parameter for <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.SendRequest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Запрос могут быть добавлены к <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> или он может использоваться в качестве параметра для <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.SendRequest%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest" /> class.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest" /> class.
The <c>distinguishedName</c> of the new object in the directory.
An array, of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute" /> objects, that contains the attributes for this object.
trans-unit.target: Массив объектов <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute" />, который содержит атрибуты для данного объекта.

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Этот параметр может иметь значение <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute[])" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest" /> class using the specified distinguished name and attributes.
trans-unit.target: Конструктор <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute[])" /> создает экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest" />, используя указанные отличительное имя и атрибуты.

trans-unit.source: The <c>distinguishedName</c> of the new object in the directory.
The object class for this object.
If this parameter is <see langword="null" />, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Если этот параметр имеет значение <see langword="null" />, возникает исключение.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest" /> class using the specified <paramref name="distinguishedName" /> and the object class.
trans-unit.target: Конструктор <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String)" /> создает экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest" />, используя указанное <paramref name="distinguishedName" /> и класс объекта.

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the `objectClass` parameter is added to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.Attributes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Значение, указанное в `objectClass` был добавлен параметр <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.Attributes%2A> свойство.

trans-unit.source: This value can be modified after this constructor is called.
trans-unit.target: Это значение может быть изменено после вызова этого конструктора.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="objectClass" /> parameter contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="objectClass" /> содержит пустую ссылку (<see langword="Nothing" /> в Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.Attributes" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection" /> of attribute-value pairs for the object.
trans-unit.target: Свойство <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.Attributes" /> содержит <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection" /> из пар атрибут-значение для объекта.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection" /> of attribute-value pairs for the object.
This property cannot be set.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.DistinguishedName" /> property contains the distinguished name of the object.
The distinguished name of the object.
A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> method creates an XML node from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> создает узел XML из указанного объекта <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object.
